attributes.action: Give the people our referendum, our promised referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want a referendum.com just about says it all.We the people were promised a referendum,a very rare thing,you did not go to the polls,you have not been voted P.M and now you say we can't even have our referendum.
You have no legitimacy,you do not represent me or any of my family and friends.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
